clickthorugh_error: Either user is not found or not agree for the click through terms and conditions
connect_wallet: Please you have added your wallet and also have funds in the connected wallet.
wrapper_error: There is some error in minting the wrapper edition for user, please try after sometime
wrapper_add_error: There is some error in adding NFT to wrapper, please try again.
wrapper_add_balance_low: Balance is low in your wallet, please add balance and try again.
2fa_error: Something went wrong. Either this record is invalid or you have entered wrong sequence secret hash
transfer_error: Something went wrong. Either this record is invalid or you have entered wrong sequence secret hash
transfer_timelapse: Maximum time which is 1 hour to complete the transaction is completed, your transaction is reverted please try again.
transfer_wronghash: No hash provided or wrong hash provided. please check and try again.
UserNotFound: Credentials not recognized. Please try again
Not_Activated: Account not activated. Please check your email and activate your account
staff_Exist: Staff with provided email address already exists
Sale_Qantity_low: Quantity of listing is greater than the quantity listing available in your account.
Nft_Exist: NFT Title Already Exists in selected category and collection
Error in Assets add Nft_id not exist: Error while adding assets as  NFT ID does not exist
Error in add Attributes Nft_id not exis: Error while adding attributes  as  NFT ID does not exist
Error in add Batches Nft_id not exist: Error while adding batches as  NFT ID does not exist
Error in add Assets Nft_id not exist: Error while adding assets as  NFT ID does not exist
Nft_already_published: You cannot update NFT, as it is already published
Nft_cannot_already_published: Sorry, you can't inactive/delete the NFT, as it is already published or the NFT edition is ongoing
Auth_Token_Not_Matched: You are not authorized to access this application, please login and try again
you_are_not_eligible_claim_nft: You are not eligible claim this NFT edition
you_have_already_sent_request: You have already sent request for claim NFT
cannot_set_flag_auction_ended: Cannot set flag status when auction has ended
cannot_cancel_winner: Cannot cancel winner after 15 days of auction end
unauthorized_activity: We noticed a suspicious activity. This incident has been logged due to security concerns.
country_has_been_blocked: You are not allow to access this site.
payment_failed: Payment failed due to unspecified error
purchase_failed: Purchase failed due to invaild amount
card_not_honored: Contact card issuer to query why payment failed
payment_not_supported_by_issuer: Issuer did not support the payment
payment_not_funded: Insufficient funds in account to fund payment
payment_denied: Payment denied by Circle Risk Service or card processor risk controls
payment_fraud_detected: Payment suspected of being associated with fraud
credit_card_not_allowed: Issuer did not support using a credit card for payment
payment_stopped_by_issuer: A stop has been placed on the payment or card
amount_should_not_be_grater_than_transac: Amount should not be grater than transaction amount
Total amount to be refunded exceeds paym: Total amount to be refunded exceeds payment amount.
the_wallet_address_is_already_linked_wit: The wallet address is already linked with other account
auction_start_time_should_be_greater_tha: Start time should be greater than current UTC time
cannot_update_nft_once_published: Cannot update NFT data once published
cannot_buy_nft_auction_ended: Sorry, this auction has ended, you cannot buy NFT at this moment
You_Must_Accept_Terms_Of_Service_And_Pri: Please accept both Terms of Service and Privacy Policy to proceed
complete_profile_to_buy_nft: You need to complete your profile in order to buy nft
currently_gas_fee_on_etherscan_is_high: Currently, gas fee on etherscan is high
cannot_refund_crypto_payment_for_now: Cannot refund crypto payment for now
refund_already_created: Refund already created for this transaction
